activity_story.note_dungeon_buff_introduce: The ocean is a wellspring of endless power. Characters with an affinity to the ocean receive the blessing of the tides.
activity_story.note_ranking_cant_like: Not enough likes. Try again next week
activity_story.tips_days_buy_unlock: Item unlock time not reached yet
activity_story.note_difficulty_completed: You have successfully cleared all the stages of this difficulty. You can either continue to sweep the Boss stages to obtain more Merfolk Tear or proceed to the next difficulty for further challenges.
activity_story.note_abyss_completed: You have successfully cleared all the stages, you can continue to sweep the Boss stages to obtain more Merfolk Tear.
activity_story.note_meimo_tanlian: Participate in the event and receive rewards
activity_story.note_chapter_1:
I go to him in haste and depart reluctantly
with many little farewells.
activity_story.note_chapter_2:
As the tide comes
we caress each other.
activity_story.note_chapter_3:
When it withdraws
I drop to his feet in prayer.
activity_story.note_chapter_4:
I may be weary
but I shall never die.
activity_story.note_difficulty_completed_2: You have completed all the levels in the current difficulty. You can continue to sweep boss levels for more X-Mas Bouquet and X-Mas Stockings or proceed to the next difficulty for further challenges.
activity_story.note_abyss_completed_2: You've cleared all the stages. You can continue to sweep boss levels for more X-Mas Bouquet and X-Mas Stockings.
activity_story.note_dungeon_buff_introduce_2: The X-Mas event is finally here! And heroes dressed in their best are receiving the blessings of the holiday.
activity_story.note_chapter_6: Frost will eventually melt, and warmth never fades away.
activity_story.activity_story|note_dungeon_quick_battle: Cleared {0}-{1}. Sweep to get the following rewards
activity_story.note_dungeon_quick_battle: Cleared {0}-{1}. Sweep to get the following rewards
activity_story.note_puzzle_clear: Find the following targets to receive rewards
activity_story.note_puzzle_reward_des: The rewards are issued automatically after stage completion.
activity_story.note_puzzle_complete: Completed {0} and obtained the rewards above.
activity_story.note_puzzle_start: A new stage is now available
activity_story.note_puzzle_end: The event will end soon. {0} can now be purchased. Don't miss out!
activity_story.note_feeding_gift_tips: Tap an icon to send the gift
activity_story.note_feeding_condition_change: Leviathan's preferred gift will change after receiving {0} more gift(s).
activity_story.condition_dialogue_1: Even a playful winter fawn knows a mischievous game or two.
activity_story.condition_dialogue_2: A bit of excitement might bring us even closer.
activity_story.condition_dialogue_3: Sweetness isn't limited to just delicious treats.
activity_story.condition_des_1: Leviathan gazes at the distant sea, seemingly wanting some special swimming gear.
activity_story.condition_des_2: The summer heat always leaves us parched. Why not prepare some drinks for Leviathan?
activity_story.condition_des_3: Leviathan's motorcycle is parked on the sea. How about finding some animal pals to keep her company?
activity_story.condition_dialogue_101: Being on the motorcycle all the time gets boring. Any fresh ideas for fun?
activity_story.condition_dialogue_102: The vast ocean always stirs my desire to conquer.
activity_story.condition_dialogue_103: Want to check out what's ahead?
activity_story.condition_dialogue_201: I'm getting a bit thirsty. Let's get something to drink!
activity_story.condition_dialogue_202: Do you think... there will coconuts on that little island over there?
activity_story.condition_dialogue_203: Fish don't get thirsty, but sea monsters do.
activity_story.condition_dialogue_301: Creatures here are far more adorable than those back in my homeland.
activity_story.condition_dialogue_302: Dip your head below the surface; it's a whole new world!
activity_story.condition_dialogue_303: Want to have a fishing contest? I won't go easy on you.
activity_story.feeding_give_1011: Want to see this form of mine? It might scare the little ones on the seafloor.
activity_story.feeding_give_1012: Hmm... puffy and soft, not bad.
activity_story.feeding_give_1021: Floating on the swim ring with the waves... now this is what I call a vacation.
activity_story.feeding_give_1022: Floating on the water's surface with it feels just like lying in your arms.
activity_story.feeding_give_2011: Interesting flavor... What did you add to it?
activity_story.feeding_give_2012: Its color is as warm as the sun on the ocean's surface.
activity_story.feeding_give_2021: Such an intoxicating liquid! You'll have to take responsibility, Omniguardian.
activity_story.feeding_give_2022: Omniguardian, you control the direction while I rest in your arms for a bit...
activity_story.feeding_give_3012: A predator of the sea! Just like me!
activity_story.feeding_give_3021: Where did you find it? It's so cute!
activity_story.feeding_give_3022: Little fish, want to try being my surfboard? No answer means yes.
activity_story.feeding_give_4011: Surfing? That might be a good idea.
activity_story.feeding_give_4012: Can it keep up with my motorcycle? Let me try.
activity_story.feeding_give_4021: Look at that big wave ahead! I'm going to ride it all the way to that little island!
activity_story.feeding_give_4022: This surfboard should fit both of us. Get closer to me, Omniguardian!
activity_story.feeding_give_5012: The coconut's fresh fragrance always helps me relax.
activity_story.feeding_give_5021: You should have a sip too, from the same straw... I don't think you'd mind.
activity_story.feeding_give_5022: You always manage to prepare my favorite things!
activity_story.feeding_give_6011: Looks like this little guy has quite a temper.
activity_story.feeding_give_6012: Is rolling into a ball its defense mechanism? How peculiar.
activity_story.feeding_give_6021: How about using it for beach volleyball? I hope the little guy won't mind.
activity_story.feeding_give_6022: Look at that pouty expression. Alright, alright, I'll put you back now.
activity_story.feeding_give_7021: Careful, it's about to drift away with the waves!
activity_story.feeding_give_7022: Bathtub, pool, ocean... Mr. Duck never misses an occasion.
activity_story.feeding_give_8012: Hmm... the ice inside seems to have melted a bit.
activity_story.feeding_give_8021: This cool feeling is absolutely wonderful.
activity_story.feeding_give_8022: Ah, the ice cube fell onto my chest. So cold!
activity_story.feeding_give_9011: Such tiny claws, yet so sharp. How interesting.
activity_story.feeding_give_9012: A little beach dweller! I can't believe you actually brought one.
activity_story.feeding_give_9021: Whose house is this? A conch shell's?
activity_story.feeding_give_9022: I heard it also loves sunbathing on the beach.
activity_story.feeding_touch_low_1: This outfit really suits me, don't you think, Omniguardian?
activity_story.feeding_touch_low_2: Take it easy. Our date's only just begun.
activity_story.feeding_touch_mid_1: Want to sit behind me? Go ahead, just hold on tight.
activity_story.feeding_touch_mid_2: So, what should we play next?
activity_story.feeding_touch_high_1: Destroying the world? That doesn't sound nearly as fun as surfing.
activity_story.feeding_touch_high_2: What intrigues you more, the swimsuit's fabric or my skin's warmth?
activity_story.note_puzzle_reward_des_1: The rewards are issued automatically after stage completion.
